00025 void clExceptionTree::PrintMethodTree(void) const
00026 {
00027   char spaceStr[] = "  ";
00028   //char arrowStr[] = "->";
00029 
00030   cerr << "**************************************************" << endl;
00031   cerr << "CALL SEQUENCE:" << endl;
00032 
00033   int numberCalls=methodTree.GetNumberItems()-1;
00034   for(int i=numberCalls; i>=0; i--)
00035   {
00036     if(i<numberCalls)
00037     {
00038       for(int j=i; j<numberCalls; j++)
00039       {
00040         cerr << spaceStr;
00041       }
00042 
00043       //cerr << arrowStr;
00044     }
00045 
00046     tMethodNameStruct *methodNameStruct=methodTree.GetItemPointer(i);
00047     cerr << methodNameStruct->methodName << endl;
00048   }
00049 }

00051 char *clExceptionTree::PrintMethodTree(char *string) const
00052 {
00053   char dummy[200];
00054   char spaceStr[] = "  ";
00055   //char arrowStr[] = "->";
00056 
00057   string = stradd(string, "**************************************************\n");
00058   string = stradd(string, "CALL SEQUENCE:\n");
00059 
00060   int numberCalls=methodTree.GetNumberItems()-1;
00061   for(int i=numberCalls; i>=0; i--)
00062   {
00063     if(i<numberCalls)
00064     {
00065       for(int j=i; j<numberCalls; j++)
00066       {
00067         string = stradd(string, spaceStr);
00068       }
00069 
00070       //string = stradd(string, arrowStr);
00071     }
00072 
00073     tMethodNameStruct *methodNameStruct=methodTree.GetItemPointer(i);
00074     sprintf(dummy, "%s\n", methodNameStruct->methodName);
00075     string = stradd(string, dummy);
00076   }
00077 
00078   return(string);
00079 }

00081 void clExceptionTree::AddMethodToTree(const char *methodName)
00082 {
00083   tMethodNameStruct methodNameStruct;
00084   strcpy(methodNameStruct.methodName, methodName);
00085 
00086   methodTree.AddItem(methodNameStruct);
00087 }

00089 void clExceptionTree::PrintError(void) const
00090 {
00091   cerr << endl;
00092   cerr << "**************************************************" << endl;
00093   cerr << "ERROR:" << endl;
00094   cerr << "  CLASS  : " << className << endl;

00096   cerr << "  MESSAGE: " << errorMessage << endl;
00097   cerr << endl;

00100 
00101   cerr << endl;
00102   cerr << "**************************************************" << endl;
